EmailTemplate.name: SGT-PA030_September18-19_2012.ConfirmationReminder
EmailTemplate.subject: SEE YOU NEXT WEEK: Billing Software Group Training in Indiana, PA on September 18-19, 2012
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
STAY CONNECTED <http://www.facebook.com/pages/Tritech-Software-Systems/89416081839> <http://twitter.com/tritechsoftware> <http://www.linkedin.com/companies/tritech-software-systems> <http://www.youtube.com/user/TriTechSoftware> We're Looking Forward to Seeing You Next Week REMINDER: Billing Software Group Training in Indiana, PA Next Week Hello {{lead.First Name:default=Billing Customer}},
We're looking forward to seeing you next week for our Billing Software Group Training. If you have questions or if there is anything we can do to make this a better experience for you, please contact us at:
CONTACT FOR MORE INFORMATION:
Kim Walk, AmbCoach kwalk@ambcoach.com | 888-463-3488
Tyler Harman, TriTech Software Systems tyler.harman@tritech.com | 800-537-3927 ext 6290
Here is a link to download a sample copy of the agenda, if you'd like: Training Agenda <http://www.tritechems.com/documents/_UG/Sample_2-day_Group_Training_agenda.pdf>. Registration will begin on the first day at 7:45 a.m. We sincerely hope that these two days of education will allow everyone to gain knowledge in the areas desired. Although this is classroom-style training, feel free to bring a laptop if you have access to one and you will be able to participate in some “hands-on” activities.
We invite you to dress casually and comfortably for the session. Since room temperatures and preferences vary from person to person, please bring a sweater or sweatshirt to wear if needed.
See you next week!
________________________________________
Billing Software Group Training in Indiana, PA on September 18-19, 2012
TRAINING LOCATION: Rustic Lodge, 2199 Oakland Avenue, Indiana, PA 15701 <http://maps.google.com/maps?oe=utf-8&rls=org.mozilla:en-US:official&client=firefox-a&um=1&ie=UTF-8&q=Rustic+Lodge,+2199+Oakland+Avenue,+Indiana,+PA+15701&fb=1&gl=us&hq=Rustic+Lodge,+2199+Oakland+Avenue,+Indiana,+PA+15701&cid=0,0,14345032003045000306&sa=X&ei=T5D8T7L6O4fxqQHywfWLCQ&ved=0CIABEPwSMAA&oi=local_group&ct=image>
RECOMMENDED HOTEL: Holiday Inn Indiana 1395 Wayne Ave., Indiana, PA 15701 Website: http://www.holidayinn.com/hotels/us/en/indiana/idipa/hoteldetail <http://www.holidayinn.com/hotels/us/en/indiana/idipa/hoteldetail> Telephone: 724-463-3561
